channel.title: Hi, I'm Max from Jitbit
channel.description:
Hi, I'm Max, co-founder of [Jitbit][1]. Many of you know my partner @jitbit – he told me about this place.
My job is mostly working on this [helpdesk app][2]. I know quite a bit about metrics, a/b testing, analytics and other data-driven stuff. Although I don't consider myself an expert in those things. I write programs since 12 years old. I've written 23085 responses to Jitbit's customer support tickets so far, so I know a thing or two about that too.
In my spare time I play guitar, read sci-fi books and ride on skate/snow-boards. I may regret saying this, but I like Star Wars prequels almost as much as the original trilogy.
Anyway, thanks for your time. Hope to become a part of this community.
[1]: http://jitbit.com [2]: http://www.jitbit.com/hosted-helpdesk/

item.title: Hi, I'm Max from Jitbit
item.dc:creator: itengelhardt
item.description:
Hi Max,

welcome to the forum.
Don’t worry about your Star Wars preferences - at least it is not Star Trek

Cheers,
Christoph

item.title: Hi, I'm Max from Jitbit
item.dc:creator: maxt3r
item.description:
Hi, I’m Max, co-founder of Jitbit. Many of you know my partner @jitbit – he told me about this place.

My job is mostly working on this helpdesk app. I know quite a bit about metrics, a/b testing, analytics and other data-driven stuff. Although I don’t consider myself an expert in those things. I write programs since 12 years old. I’ve written 23085 responses to Jitbit’s customer support tickets so far, so I know a thing or two about that too.

In my spare time I play guitar, read sci-fi books and ride on skate/snow-boards. I may regret saying this, but I like Star Wars prequels almost as much as the original trilogy.

Anyway, thanks for your time. Hope to become a part of this community.
